item.title: I-5 South - Exit 522
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 522 - I-80/San Francisco/Reno (Nevada). I-5 continues south to Los Angeles.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 522
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 522 - I-80/Reno (Nevada)/San Francisco. Continue south along I-5 to Los Angeles.

item.title: I-5 South - Entering Sacramento
item.description: Sacramento City Limit on I-5 south. Sacramento is the capital and the 6th largest city (according to 2010 census) in California.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 525B
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 525B - CA-99 North/Yuba City/Marysville.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 525B
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 525B - CA-99 North/Yuba City/Marysville. CA-99 joins I-5 south to downtown Sacramento.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 649
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 649 - CA-36/Antelope Blvd./To CA-99/Chico. This used to be the northern terminus of CA-99, but it was moved east of here to the CA-36 junction a few years back.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exits 242 and 241
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 242 - CA-120 East/Sonora/Yosemite Ave. Approaching Exit 241 - CA-120 West/San Francisco. Continue south on CA-99 for Fresno and Los Angeles. CA-120 joins CA-99 south briefly through Manteca.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 252A
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 252A - Mariposa Road/Escalon. Continue south on CA-99 for Modesto and Los Angeles.

item.title: CA-99 South/CA-4 East - Exit 252B
item.description: CA-99 South/CA-4 East approaching Exit 252B - CA-4/Farmington Road. CA-4 leaves CA-99 southbound here.

item.title: CA-99 South/CA-4 East Approaching CA-4 East
item.description: CA-99 South/CA-4 East Approaching CA-4 East/Angels Camp. This is Exit 252B (not signed). CA-4 east leaves CA-99 at Exit 252B.

item.title: CA-99 South at CA-149
item.description: CA-99 south at CA-149. Use CA-149 south for CA-70, Oroville, and Marysville. Continue south on CA-99 for Yuba City.

item.title: CA-99 South Approaching CA-149
item.description: CA-99 South approaching CA-149. Use CA-149 South for Oroville, Marysville, and CA-70. Continue south on CA-99 for Yuba City.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 376
item.description: CA-99 south approaching Exit 376 - Durham.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 383
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 383 - Skyway/Park Ave.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 384
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 384 - East 20th St.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 385
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 385 - CA-32/Orland/Chester.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 386
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 386 - E. First Ave.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 387A
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 387A - Cohasset Road/Mangrove Ave.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 387B
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 387B - East Ave.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exit 389
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 389 - Eaton Road.

item.title: CA-99 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-99 south to Los Molinos, Chico, and Marysville.

item.title: CA-99 South
item.description: CA-99 south. This is the first CA-99 shield on CA-99 southbound.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 East at CA-99. Turn left to continue east on CA-36. Continue straight ahead for CA-99.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 east at CA-99. Use CA-36 east for Lassen National Park and Susanville. Continue south on CA-99 for Chico.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 east approaching CA-99. Turn left at junction (CA-36) for Lassen National Park and Susanville.

item.title: CA-36 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-36 east to Lassen Park and Susanville, via CA-36. Distance to Chico via CA-99.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 649
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 649 - CA-36/Central Red Bluff/Antelope Blvd./To CA-99/Chico. This used to be the northern terminus of CA-99, but it was moved east of here to the CA-36 junction a few years back.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North - Exit 4A
item.description: US-50 West/BL-80 West/CA-99 north at Exit 4A - I-5 South/Los Angeles. I-5 North/To CA-99/Redding. CA-99 is marked as To CA-99 while is joins I-5 through Sacramento. Continue west on BL-80 (and US-50) to San Francisco.

item.title: BL-80/US-50 West/CA-99 North Approaching Exit 4A
item.description: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 north approaching Exit 4A - I-5 South/Los Angeles and I-5 North/To CA-99/Redding. Continue west on BL-80/US-50 for I-80 to San Francisco.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North at Exit 4B
item.description: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North at Exit 4B - Downtown/10th St. Approaching Exit 4A - I-5/CA-99 North/Los Angeles/Redding.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North - Exit 5
item.description: US-50/BL-80 West/CA-99 North at Exit 5 - 16th St. Approaching Exit 4B - Downtown/10th St.

item.title: BL-80 West at US-50 and CA-99
item.description: BL-80 west at Exits 6A and 6B. Exit 6A is BL-80 West/US-50/To I-5/South Lake Tahoe/San Francisco. Exit 6B is CA-99 South/Fresno.

item.title: BL-80 West at Exit 6C - Approaching Exit 6A and 6B
item.description: BL-80 west at Exit 6C - P St. Approaching Exits 6A - US-50 East/BL-80 West and Exit 6B - CA-99 South.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 86
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 86 - I-5/CA-99/Sacramento/Redding. I-80 continues east to Reno.

item.title: I-80 East Approaching Exit 86
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 86 - I-5/CA-99/Sacramento/Redding.

item.title: I-5 North at CA-99/Yuba City Exit
item.description: I-5 north at CA-99 North/Yuba City/Marysville. Overhead approaching Sac. Intl. Airport, and I-5 to Woodland and Redding.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 95
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 95 - BL-80/To CA-99 South/Capitol City Freeway/Sacramento Exit on I-80 West. I-80 overheads to San Francisco and I-5.
